title: New: flor – back again
body:
**flor** are undoubtedly the sound of a summer that isn’t here yet.

So their debut **_sounds_** EP has perhaps arrived a couple of months too early, yet that allows it the time to grow, and hit the mainstream channels right as the summer weather kicks in. From the out-and-out pop of _get behind this_, to their latest take, the equally as refined, but more subdued _back again_, flor have proven themselves to be one of 2015’s most exciting new artists.
